common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"user_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a user."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by(depends on different APIs) partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token,  user_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm."}]
define: Create a new live stream, include basic information, like cover, title, description, type (test live or normal live). (Only for TW, ID, TH)

error_list.name: error_data
error_list.description: The last session(session_id:{{sid}}) is still ongoing, please end it first

error_list.name: error_data
error_list.description: You do not have permission to livestream

error_list.name: error_server
error_list.description: The API is not supported for current region

error_list.name: error_server
error_list.description: Too many requests, please try again later

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

The title of livestream session, cannot exceed 200 characters.

","name":"title","sample":"test livestream","type":"string","required":"True","key":"JYfzrna"},{"description":"

The description of livestream session, cannot exceed 200 characters.

","name":"description","sample":"test","type":"string","required":"False","key":"DnbnkFT"},{"description":"

The cover image URL of livestream session.

Please call the v2.livestream.upload_image to upload the cover image file and get the cover_image_url.

","name":"cover_image_url","sample":"https://cf.shopee.sg/file/id-11134104-7r98o-m9pq7jw2cdhx5e","type":"string","required":"True","key":"jYSYeTC"},{"description":"

Indicate whether the livestream session is for testing purpose only.

","name":"is_test","sample":"false","type":"boolean","required":"False","key":"SSasERr"}],"response_params":[{"name":"error","type":"string","sample":"","description":"

Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","key":"mJXYbaP"},{"description":"

Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"message","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"wHpyWfA"},{"description":"

The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

","name":"request_id","sample":"e3e3e7f3360690a5b55f0689f8a4e801","type":"string","required":null,"key":"tTpyHnm"},{"description":"

Detail informations you are querying.

","name":"response","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"xbpkna","children":[{"description":"

The identifier of livestream session.

","name":"session_id","sample":"636732","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"HxiJERr"}]}]}
